title: doc: Contribution guidelines don't specify code review process for non-main repos
body:
The [Contribution Guidelines][doc] doc says that `git mail` will automatically cc golang-codereviews on all code reviews. However I mailed the following two reviews today, and it doesn't appear as if that happened for either one:

1. https://go-review.googlesource.com/#/c/3902/
2. https://go-review.googlesource.com/#/c/3950/

I assume that's because these aren't in the core repository. Can you confirm? And should the documentation be updated to be clearer about what to do for other repos?

[doc]: https://golang.org/doc/contribute.html
